documents.document: @nicolawillsxx yeah! Like everyone I follow is fine, but I can't stop myself going onto the explore option sometimes

When you've reached the halfway point for your dissertation word count, and you've only addressed one theme... I gotta chill.
Mozart's Requiem has been stuck in my head continuously. I hope that this isn't an omen.
I need 10 lives so that I can be a performer, food/body image counsellor, baker, historian, cat and all of the other things I want to be.
@_redbelt I'm so sorry
When your class starts discussing if creation is pointless, but you're so hangry you can't even focus on the wall, never mind deep questions

@lucy_coatman mental health and happiness are just as important, and creating a bad relationship with food and exercise is damaging.
@lucy_coatman If you want to do it, please do it in a healthy/sustainable way #HowToLoseWeightWell
Diet culture is incredibly draining and causes so much life sapping restriction.
@jlowndesx I think my grandparents just picked a really random one off amazon and it's worked fine for warming me up!

Spending my final hours of being 21 by dancing to the Fast Food song in my Winnie the Pooh pyjamas.
@Andree_Coatman I was too tired to realise there was any... now I'm sad.
@Andree_Coatman I ran out of porridge!
@JesterPilgrim I'm sad because I had such fond memories of the chocolate version. Now I don't want to eat it in case it ruins it.
@JesterPilgrim okay but seriously, I loved this stuff when I was little. Just had some of my mum's because I ran out of oats and
@JesterPilgrim thanks for the nightmares Jesse...
Ready Brek might possibly be the most revolting thing I have had the displeasure of eating
@Sophaba nooo don't! We need to seek out another yummy cake place for next time xx
@Sophaba thank YOU! Sorry I was a bit out of it, headaches are a killer! X

Sick of seeing the idea over social media that you have to punish yourself for enjoying food over Christmas. Treat yourself with kindness.

Can't wait to graduate just so that I actually have the time to read the books I got for Christmas...!
I'm 21 years old, and I still woke up at every hour last night. MERRY CHRISTMAS!!!
I know I am shamefully late, but I finally saw Fantastic Beasts, and I loved it!
The fact it features Mayerling and is followed by a show on Ludwig II's castles is just the icing on the cake...
TV show about Empress Sisi? Thank you @BBCFOUR for having my back & making me feel as though I'm working on my dissertation this Xmas break!
